page.title: 03MARWOOD N. TRANSPORT
page.content: There are only two roads in this area which have a single lane for each direction of traffic.They are busy between 8.15am_9am and 4.30_6pm,when people travel through the area on their way to work. 45 vehicles passed through Milltown between 8.40 and 8.55am on 4.7.85. on their way towards Barnstaple. 20 vehicles went in the other direction. All the other roads are very narrow and winding with passing places and poor visibility.There are no general bus services or other public transport other than the school buses so cars are essential and nearly every family has at least one if not two.
